categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Juntah Herm was a lieutenant within the Galactic Empire, and an Imperial pilot. Some time after 0 BBY, Juntah Herm was stationed in the Imperial Outpost on Dantooine.
Juntah Herm first appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies with the release of the Jump to Lightspeed expansion pack.
